text: This is a list of cities in the Republic of North Macedonia. In the country there are 34 cities. 5 have a population of over 50,000 and 12 towns have a population of under 10,000 people. The capital city, Skopje, is home to around 30% of the total population of the country. == Eastern Region == city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Berovo Berovo 7,002 Delčevo Delčevo 11,500 Kočani Kočani 28,330 Makedonska Kamenica Makedonska Kamenica 5,147 Pehčevo Pehčevo 3,237 Probištip Probištip 8,714 Štip Štip 43,652 Vinica Vinica 10,863 == Northeastern Region== city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Kratovo Kratovo 6,924 Kriva Palanka Kriva Palanka 14,558 Kumanovo Kumanovo 70,842 == Pelagonia Region == city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Bitola Bitola 74,550 Demir Hisar Demir Hisar 2,593 Kruševo Kruševo 5,330 Prilep Prilep 66,246 Resen Resen 8,748 == Polog Region == city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Gostivar Gostivar 35,847 Tetovo Tetovo 52,915 == Skopje Region == city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Skopje Greater Skopje 467,257 ==Southeastern Region== city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Bogdanci Bogdanci 6,011 Gevgelija Gevgelija 15,685 Radoviš Radoviš 16,223 Strumica Strumica 35,311 Valandovo Valandovo 4,402 ==Southwestern Region== city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Debar Debar 14,561 Kičevo Kičevo 27,067 Makedonski Brod Makedonski Brod 3,740 Ohrid Ohrid 42,033 Struga Struga 16,559 == Vardar Region== city municipality population coat of arms flag picture Demir Kapija Demir Kapija 3,275 Kavadarci Kavadarci 29,188 Negotino Negotino 13,284 Sveti Nikole Sveti Nikole 13,746 Veles Veles 43,716 == References == * North Macedonia North Macedonia
title: List of cities in North Macedonia
